content: वासनं [वास्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Perfuming, scenting. {@--2@} Infusing. {@--3@} Dwelling, a biding. {@--4@} An abode, a dwelling. {@--5@} Any receptacle, a basket, box, vessel &c.; <ls>Y. 2. 65</ls> (वासनं निक्षेपाधाभूरंत संपुटादिकं समुद्रं ग्रंथ्यदियुतम्). {@--6@} Knowledge. {@--7@} Clothes, dress. {@--8@} A cover, an envelope. {@--9@} A kind of posture practised by ascetics in abstract meditation.
